landingText: Graduating from University of British Columbia class of 2023
Looking for new challenges and opportunities

projects.title: Image Repository
projects.type: A website to store and view images

data.description:
My team and I created a GraphQL + React web application to track and display internal analytic data. I utilize Redis caching and Dataloader batching to improve performance. 
Finally, I deployed the website using AWS EKS, Helm Chart, and Docker to ensure liveliness and readiness.

data.company: UBC Department of Computer and Electrical Engineering
data.description: Setup and analyze testing simulation to measure the performance of machine learning computations on a Processing In Memory architecture (PIM).
Created detailed guides and workshops regarding teaching technologies such as Canvas for the faculty and conducted surveys and analyzed responses on Qualtrics.
